des:
With the Unito smart home Skill for Alexa, you can interact with your Unito water system using just your voice. Turn it on and off water, set

temperature, set the soda strength, and more, all from any Alexa-enabled device or Alexa apps on iOS and Android.

Before setting for Alexa app, make sure you have do provisioning on water system and keep the hub powered and connected to network..

1. Enable this skill and link your Unito account.

2. Next, discover your unito device by saying "Alexa,Discover Devices" or by clicking the Discover Devices button in the Smart Home section of Alexa app.

3. Your water system devces should appear in your

list of discovered devices.

4. Now all setup is finished, you can simply ask

Alexa to turn on, turn off or set temperature for the

water system.

We have device name such as "hot water","cold water","soda water" and so on. you can say the following:

On/0ff

"Alexa, turn on [device name]"

"Alexa, turn off [device name]"

Set temperature( only for hot water and cold

water)

"Alexa, set [device name] to XX degrees"

Set soda strength

"Alexa, set soda water to soft/medium/intense"Alexa, set carbonized water to soft/medium/intense"

For more information, please refer to this link:

https://unito-tech.com/en/faucet.php
